Just a request regarding this:

> To clear up any misconceptions:
>
> 1)I consider posting programming code to be relevant as long as it
> involves the game gladiator and does not break another rule.  That
> means I do not have an exclusive monopoly on posting code.

If you are going to post code, please post the minimal amount required, and
if it is more than a page or two long it is much better to upload it to a
website somewhere temporarily - the people that are interested will still go
and check it while those that aren't can happily ignore it without risk of
missing some interesting info that might be burried in it.

- Deathifier
